\label{constraint:bind_instance_active_with_instance_tasks_2} \mathop\forall_{ {t \in \glssymbol{TASK}}\atop {{i \in \glssymbol{INSTANCE}}\atop {{idx \in \{ x | \ x \in [{0},\ {\glssymbol{instance_max_machines}[_{i}] - 1}] \}}}}}   \glssymbol{InstanceTasks}[_{t,i,idx}] \le \glssymbol{task_count}[_{t}] \cdot \glssymbol{InstanceActive}[_{t,i,idx}] \\

\label{constraint:keep_layer_deadline_2} \mathop\forall_{ {l \in \glssymbol{LAYER}}\atop {{t \in \glssymbol{LAYER_TASK}[_{l}]}\atop {{i \in \glssymbol{INSTANCE}}\atop {{idx \in \{ x | \ x \in [{0},\ {\glssymbol{instance_max_machines}[_{i}] - 1}] \}}}}}}   \glssymbol{InstanceTasks}[_{t,i,idx}] \cdot \glssymbol{unit_time}[_{t,i,storage}] \le \glssymbol{LayerTime}[_{l}] \\
\label{constraint:is_there_enough_processing_power_to_do_the_tasks} \mathop\forall_{ {t \in \glssymbol{TASK}}\atop {{i \in \glssymbol{INSTANCE}}\atop {{idx \in \{ x | \ x \in [{0},\ {\glssymbol{instance_max_machines}[_{i}] - 1}] \}}}}}   \glssymbol{InstanceHours}[_{t,i,idx}] \ge \glssymbol{InstanceTasks}[_{t,i,idx}] \cdot \glssymbol{unit_time}[_{t,i,storage}] \\
\label{constraint:but_not_more} \mathop\forall_{ {t \in \glssymbol{TASK}}\atop {{i \in \glssymbol{INSTANCE}}\atop {{idx \in \{ x | \ x \in [{0},\ {\glssymbol{instance_max_machines}[_{i}] - 1}] \}}}}}   \glssymbol{InstanceHours}[_{t,i,idx}] \le \glssymbol{InstanceTasks}[_{t,i,idx}] \cdot \glssymbol{unit_time}[_{t,i,storage}] + 1 \\
\label{constraint:enough_power} \mathop\forall_{ {t \in \glssymbol{TASK}}}   \sum_{ {i \in \glssymbol{INSTANCE}}\atop {{idx \in \{ x | \ x \in [{0},\ {\glssymbol{instance_max_machines}[_{i}] - 1}] \}}}}\glssymbol{InstanceTasks}[_{t,i,idx}] = \glssymbol{task_count}[_{t}] \\

\label{constraint:force_provider_instance_limit} \mathop\forall_{ {l \in \glssymbol{LAYER}}\atop {{p \in \glssymbol{PROVIDER}}}}   \sum_{ {i \in \glssymbol{PROVIDER_INSTANCES}[_{p}]}\atop {{t \in \glssymbol{LAYER_TASK}[_{l}]}\atop {{idx \in \{ x | \ x \in [{0},\ {\glssymbol{instance_max_machines}[_{i}] - 1}] \}}}}}\glssymbol{InstanceActive}[_{t,i,idx}] \le \glssymbol{provider_max_machines}[_{p}]
